event.descr:
The interface %interface% generated a Syslog Message.
Node ID: %nodeid%
Host: %nodelabel%
Interface: %interface%
Message: %parm[syslogmessage]%
Process: %parm[process]%
PID: %parm[processid]%
event.logmsg:
An OpenNMS Event has been received as a Syslog Message

Message: %parm[syslogmessage]%
